SELECT si.id, si.code, si.user_id AS userId, si.introduction, si.tag, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, ai.status_date AS statusDate, ai.images, si.status FROM shop_info si LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) LEFT JOIN audit_info ai ON (ai.user_id = si.user_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shopInfo.userName},'%')
AND si.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shopInfo.tag},'%')
AND si.introduction LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shopInfo.introduction},'%')
group by si.id
